sub_title: Business & Marketing Mentor for Business Owners Who Want More Ease, Fulfillment & Profit ⚡️21 Years in Business 🔥 Idea Generator 💡 Speaker 🎙️Meaningpreneur Podcast Host 💗 Member @MeaningfulBusiness ⬇️FREE Report⬇️
summary:
Helping You Transform Your Business for More Ease, Fulfillment, and Profit. If you want more clients, be sure to grab a copy of my Free Special Report: 7 Steps to Attract More Clients in Less Time, at my website fireflycoaching.com. Full of practical advice that works.

As a Business Owner, you want to make a prosperous living doing the work that you love.

To be visible you need to have a solid business model, be able to talk about your business in a memorable way, and know what the most effective marketing strategies are – specifically for you.

This can be confusing and frustrating to figure out on your own. You need the answers now because you don’t have a second to waste.

BUSINESS MODEL
I help you create a business model that works for your unique business (business model is just a fancy term for how your business makes money).

We’ll figure out who you want to serve and how you help them as well as your packaging and pricing.

MARKETING MESSAGES
Once you have a business model that rocks, we’ll figure out the best way for you to talk about what you do.

MARKETING STRATEGIES
Then I’ll take you past the marketing clutter, straight to the right marketing solutions that fit for you.

This way, you can promote your business with supreme confidence and get the results that you want, including a steady stream of cool clients.

I’m a Business & Marketing Mentor and I invite you to get a copy of my Free Special Report:
'7 Steps to Attract More Clients in Less Time' plus free Business Building Tips at my website: 
➡️ fireflycoaching.com.

Get in touch, send an email to: stephanie@fireflycoaching.com

Let’s connect on Instagram @fireflycoaching 

Specialties: 
Marketing Coaching
Online Marketing
Small Business Coaching
Social Media Marketing
Networking
Promotion
Brainstorming Ideas
Discovering Hidden Profits
Writing
Speaking
Business Development

treasury_media.title: Stephanie Ward on LinkedIn: How to Use LinkedIn to Connect With People in a Meaningful Way
treasury_media.description: Business Owners, LinkedIn is an amazing place to connect with interesting people. And you can do it in a human way. I'll share how plus four tips to improve... 32 comments on LinkedIn

treasury_media.title: A Fresh Take on Small Business Marketing from Chris Guillebeau
treasury_media.description:
Chris Guillebeau is a New York Times bestselling author, speaker, blogger and successful entrepreneur. He’s also an extremely kind and thoughtful person.

In this interview, Chris shares his top three marketing strategies for Small Business Owners plus a bonus tip.

One of them has to do with his Grandma and another one is about a fish.

See the entire post here: http://www.fireflycoaching.com/a-fresh-take-on-small-business-marketing-from-chris-guillbeau/

treasury_media.title: SPARK Interview: Marja Godvliet Talks With Stephanie Ward
treasury_media.description: http://www.fireflycoaching.com Marja Godvliet of http://we-club.eu/we-rise-interviews/ asked me about the next step for women entrepreneurs and how to stand out from the noise. Find out more about SPARK here: http://www.sparkwomene.eu

treasury_media.title: How Many Times to Follow Up with Someone and How to Do It
treasury_media.description:
What do you do when you send someone a message and you don’t hear back from them?

Do you assume they aren’t interested? Take it personally? Give up and move on? Doing this does not serve you or your business.

Here is exactly how you can follow up and how to know when to stop.

See the entire blog post here: http://www.fireflycoaching.com/how-many-times-to-follow-up-with-someone-and-how-to-do-it/

treasury_media.title: 3 Reasons Your Business Needs LinkedIn More Than Facebook
treasury_media.description:
Growing a business is about connecting with people and building relationships.

You can do that offline and also online. But it’s getting more crowded online and harder to see the things you want to see.

I have a remarkable solution for you. It’s our old friend, LinkedIn. 

Here are three ways you can use LinkedIn to discover cool people and increase your visibility.

See the entire post here: http://www.fireflycoaching.com/3-reasons-your-business-needs-linkedin-more-than-facebook/

treasury_media.title: Want Growth to Be Easier? Create Strategic Alliance Partnerships
treasury_media.description: Get my detailed summary that explains what Strategic Alliance Partnerships are, examples of partnerships, how to find partners, how to structure the partnership, and ideas about your partners can promote you. Follow this link to the entire post with the video and the download link is below the video: http://www.fireflycoaching.com/want-growth-to-be-easier-create-strategic-alliance-partnerships/.

profile_positions.description: My name is Stephanie Ward and I am a business and marketing coach who is passionate about helping business owners build successful businesses!  I do this by drawing upon years of experience as a business owner myself.  I started my company in April, 2002 after spending time in the business world in such roles as: business development, sales, management and my favorite - marketing.  My formal education includes a Bachelor’s degree in Business and a Master’s degree in Communication as well as graduation from an ICF certified coach training program.
profile_positions.title: Business & Marketing Mentor fo Business Owners Who Want More Ease, Fulfillment & Profit

profile_positions.description: Business Consultant for large ICT company working for clients to: Design and implement training; Develop communication plans, marketing plans, and business plans; and Manage projects

Manager of Customer Service/Inside Sales Group (six people); Conducted Training and Development for Employees; Continued Texas Sales Role for four months in Addition to Marketing Communications Manager
